title: Werribee: in harmony with nature
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Filmpartnership
brief_description: Deals with the disposal of Melbourne’s sewage through the land sewerage scheme at Werribee farm which involves natural purification and recycling.
